issue.title: [CF 1434] BurstHaste does not include more recent versions of Drums
issue.body:
In Buff/Debuff category, BurstHaste equivalency includes "Drums of Rage"(which does not work for players above lvl 90).

The proposition is to also include "Drums of Fury" and "Drums of the Mountain".


> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien | Imported from CurseForge issue #1434 | Raw

comments.body:
Added in the next version - thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
